title: Maisy May
description:
How does an emo teen with an ex-druggie mum, a nonexistent father and a penchant for fast cars fit into a traditional Aussie church? And why is the new boy, Mr Perfect Pastor's Kid, the one to make her suddenly question every belief she holds dear?Maisy May is a novella - a short novel - for teens and adults. It is the first in a series of three about Maisy.


      Contains occasional profanity, and sexual and religious themes.
author: Naomi Kramer
